demolition

类 Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Bomb
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DrawableObject

    public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawableObject
    The type Bomb.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Bomb(App app)
      Instantiates a new Bomb.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      set explosion sprites in 4 directions.

      Gets bomb status.

      Initialization bomb.
      void loadImages()
      Load images.
      void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Sets position.

      change the status of bomb and draw in the Papplet, this method is called in every frame

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadImages

        public void loadImages()
        Load images.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
                        int y)
        Sets position.
        参数:
        x - bomb's x position
        y - bomb's y position

      • getBombStatus

        public java.lang.String getBombStatus()
        Gets bomb status.
        返回:
        the bomb status

      • explosion

        public void explosion(boolean isDraw)
        set explosion sprites in 4 directions.
        参数:
        isDraw - is draw explosion image

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialization bomb.
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 DrawableObject

      • tick

        public void tick(boolean draw)
        change the status of bomb and draw in the Papplet, this method is called in every frame
        指定者:
        tick 在接口中 DrawableObject
        参数:
        draw - is draw bombs' images
